snippet.title: THE SUSPENSE | Steam Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo available!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2325530/

THE SUSPENSE — first person horror about a man tortured by the hardships of life among «endless rusty walls».

STORY
   Doesn't matter what the past held, impossible to live in the future, but it's clear that the present is a torment. Every day, the main character and his mentor live by the same routine. They work hard on a mysterious project related to Artificial Intelligence. Moreover, the constant and radical control exerted by machines can crush anyone's consciousness, and if you can't deal with it — it's better not to know what will happen to you. So many questions and so few answers. It's time to do something about this...
   Explore the world of a terrifying alternative future, overcome challenges, and maybe you'll be saved (or at least learn a hint of the truth).

GAMEPLAY
-Easy gameplay that includes the genres of walking simulator, puzzles, platforming
-Interact with the world around you
-Minimalistic User Interface
-Use various methods to solve tasks and complete the game

FEATURES
-Depressing atmosphere of loneliness and isolation, helplessness and paranoia
-Different puzzles
-PSX-style graphics + new rendering elements (Parallax textures, Volumetric fog and more)
-Original soundtracks
-Average playthrough: 1 hour 15 minutes

The demo is actually "raw", but there's still a lot ahead. Even now, you can see style/graphics/interaction system...
And ofc need to do some tutorials about my shooter template, so be patient...
